message: Mink is sitting on the couch in the downstairs living room, fiddling with some kind of device.
His bird is preening on the back of the couch.
The moment I see him, my heart starts to pound.
The faint smell of cinnamon in the air only makes it worse.
I decide to ignore him and head straight for the bathroom.

name: ミンク
message: "Hey."
I turn around, trying to look calmer than I feel.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...What now?"

name: ミンク
message: "Put this in your Allmate."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"

Mink throws something at me.
I catch it. It's a tiny USB stick.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What's this?"

name: ミンク
message: "The tower has armed Allmates for security. It's a virus to put them out of commission."

name: ミンク
message: "You'll connect your Allmate to their network when we get inside."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Where did you get that information?"

name: ミンク
message: "A guard."
He said something similar about the club membership card.

The prison system in the Old Residential District is as messed up as everything else.

Apparently, it's perfectly normal for prisoners to exchange information with guards and the police.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What'll happen to Ren if I install it?"

name: ミンク
message: "Don't know, don't care."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You don't care?! No way I'm installing some shady program on Ren. Keep your damn virus."

name: ミンク
message: "...How stupid are you?"
Mink narrows his eyes at me.

name: ミンク
message: "I've been wondering. Why are you so attached to that Allmate? It's just a tool. Replaceable."

name: ミンク
message: "Or do you need your precious little teddy bear just to sleep at night?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...He's not replaceable. Don't you dare call him that."

name: ミンク
message: "It's a piece of junk. There's dozens of better models. You could get the same design and personality matrix and you wouldn't know the difference."

name: 蒼葉
message: "No. Maybe that's how you feel about Allmates... but that's now how I feel about Ren."
I glance at Mink's Allmate out of the corner of my eye.
What does the bird think about what his owner said?
But he just keeps on preening his feathers like he hasn't heard a thing.
Maybe he's heard it before, and accepts it.

name: ミンク
message: "I don't care what you think. This is part of the plan. Do it."

name: 蒼葉
message: "No."

name: ミンク
message: "If you fuck up, the whole plan falls apart. This isn't just about you."
I look down at Ren.
He meets my gaze silently, tongue hanging out.

...I can't.
I just can't do it.
